item.description: https://gohugo.io/ #Go framework to build static websites Can detect changes and reload the new version Markdown -> static HTML Setting up Hugo installation sudo apt install hugo # or latest release go install -tags extended github.com/gohugoio/hugo@latest Create project hugo new site soexample cd soexample # init as a git repo git init # add a theme so hugo can display something (can be just downloaded too) git submodule add https://github.com/spf13/hyde.git themes/hyde # should display page with no posts at http://localhost:1313/ hugo serve folder will look like ├── archetypes │ └── default.
